title: 01/14/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/14/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the blockbuster trade that sent James Harden to Brooklyn. ESPN's Tim MacMahon discusses why James didn't end up in Philly. Nets' Studio Host Frank Isola joins to break down the trade from Brooklyn's perspective. NBA HOF Charles Barkley explains why he '"prayed" for this trade to happen, while throwing a little jab at Shaq. And FS1's Nick Wright discusses why he thinks Lebron had a bit of an effect on this move.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
